section.title: Tracking System Call Volume Per Process
section.para: This section illustrates how to determine which processes are performing the highest volume of system calls. In previous sections, we've described how to monitor the top system calls used by the system over time (). We've also described how to identify which applications use a specific set of "polling suspect" system calls the most (). Monitoring the volume of system calls made by each process provides more data in investigating your system for polling processes and other resource hogs.
lists the top 20 processes performing the highest number of system calls. It also lists how many system calls each process performed during the time period. Refer to for a sample output.
